column2:
Check out how to use Kibana (https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/ecs/current/ecs-converting.html) to generate Elasticsearch
pipelines from your mapping CSV exports to help you get started mapping to Elastic Common Schema (ECS),

column3: 1. Make a copy of this spreadsheet to your Google Docs account, or export to Excel
2. Duplicate the "Template" sheet for every event source you would like to migrate
3. Start mapping how your event source will need to be adjusted in order to map to ECS
4. Export the "Template" sheet(s) as CSV to use in Kibana

column2: Note: add as many columns as you need, but do not change the columns source_field, destination_field, copy_action or format_action.
